ZCL_FI_JOURNAL_POST.source:
CLASS zcl_fi_journal_post DEFINITION PUBLIC FINAL CREATE PUBLIC.
  PUBLIC SECTION.
    METHODS post_journal
      IMPORTING iv_bukrs TYPE bukrs
                iv_blart TYPE blart
                it_items TYPE zfi_journal_items_t
      RETURNING VALUE(rv_belnr) TYPE belnr_d.
    METHODS reverse_document
      IMPORTING iv_bukrs TYPE bukrs
                iv_belnr TYPE belnr_d
                iv_gjahr TYPE gjahr.
  PRIVATE SECTION.
    METHODS validate_items
      IMPORTING it_items TYPE zfi_journal_items_t
      RETURNING VALUE(rv_valid) TYPE abap_bool.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_fi_journal_post IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD post_journal.
    DATA: lt_bseg TYPE TABLE OF bseg.
    SELECT * FROM bseg INTO TABLE lt_bseg
      WHERE bukrs = iv_bukrs AND gjahr = sy-datum(4).
    " Process journal items
    rv_belnr = '0000000001'.
  ENDMETHOD.
  METHOD reverse_document.
    SELECT SINGLE * FROM bkpf WHERE bukrs = iv_bukrs AND belnr = iv_belnr AND gjahr = iv_gjahr.
  ENDMETHOD.
  METHOD validate_items.
    rv_valid = abap_true.
  ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.

ZCL_FI_VENDOR_BALANCE.source:
CLASS zcl_fi_vendor_balance DEFINITION PUBLIC FINAL CREATE PUBLIC.
  PUBLIC SECTION.
    METHODS get_open_items
      IMPORTING iv_lifnr TYPE lifnr
                iv_bukrs TYPE bukrs
      EXPORTING et_items TYPE zfi_open_items_t.
    METHODS get_cleared_items
      IMPORTING iv_lifnr TYPE lifnr
                iv_bukrs TYPE bukrs
      EXPORTING et_items TYPE zfi_cleared_items_t.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_fi_vendor_balance IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD get_open_items.
    SELECT * FROM bsik INTO TABLE et_items
      WHERE lifnr = iv_lifnr AND bukrs = iv_bukrs.
  ENDMETHOD.
  METHOD get_cleared_items.
    SELECT * FROM bsak INTO TABLE et_items
      WHERE lifnr = iv_lifnr AND bukrs = iv_bukrs.
  ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.

ZCL_FI_CUSTOMER_AGING.source:
CLASS zcl_fi_customer_aging DEFINITION PUBLIC FINAL CREATE PUBLIC.
  PUBLIC SECTION.
    METHODS calculate_aging
      IMPORTING iv_kunnr TYPE kunnr
                iv_bukrs TYPE bukrs
      RETURNING VALUE(rs_aging) TYPE zfi_aging_result.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_fi_customer_aging IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD calculate_aging.
    DATA: lt_open TYPE TABLE OF bsid,
          lt_cleared TYPE TABLE OF bsad.
    SELECT * FROM bsid INTO TABLE lt_open
      WHERE kunnr = iv_kunnr AND bukrs = iv_bukrs.
    SELECT * FROM bsad INTO TABLE lt_cleared
      WHERE kunnr = iv_kunnr AND bukrs = iv_bukrs.
    " Customer master lookup
    SELECT SINGLE * FROM kna1 WHERE kunnr = iv_kunnr.
    rs_aging-total_open = lines( lt_open ).
  ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.

ZCL_FI_CREDIT_CHECK.source:
CLASS zcl_fi_credit_check DEFINITION PUBLIC FINAL CREATE PUBLIC.
  PUBLIC SECTION.
    METHODS check_credit_limit
      IMPORTING iv_kunnr TYPE kunnr
                iv_amount TYPE wrbtr
      RETURNING VALUE(rv_ok) TYPE abap_bool.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_fi_credit_check IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD check_credit_limit.
    DATA: lv_limit TYPE ukmbp_cms-credit_limit.
    SELECT SINGLE credit_limit FROM ukmbp_cms INTO lv_limit
      WHERE partner = iv_kunnr.
    IF iv_amount <= lv_limit.
      rv_ok = abap_true.
    ENDIF.
  ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.

ZCL_MM_PO_ENHANCE.source:
CLASS zcl_mm_po_enhance DEFINITION PUBLIC FINAL CREATE PUBLIC.
  PUBLIC SECTION.
    METHODS enhance_po
      IMPORTING iv_ebeln TYPE ebeln
      CHANGING cs_ekko TYPE ekko.
    METHODS get_vendor_info
      IMPORTING iv_lifnr TYPE lifnr
      RETURNING VALUE(rs_vendor) TYPE lfa1.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_mm_po_enhance IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD enhance_po.
    SELECT * FROM ekko WHERE ebeln = iv_ebeln.
      cs_ekko = ekko.
    ENDSELECT.
    " Also check vendor
    DATA: ls_vendor TYPE lfa1.
    SELECT SINGLE * FROM lfa1 INTO ls_vendor WHERE lifnr = cs_ekko-lifnr.
    " User exit hook for custom fields
    CALL CUSTOMER-FUNCTION '001'
      EXPORTING iv_ebeln = iv_ebeln
      CHANGING cs_ekko = cs_ekko.
  ENDMETHOD.
  METHOD get_vendor_info.
    SELECT SINGLE * FROM lfa1 INTO rs_vendor WHERE lifnr = iv_lifnr.
    " Also get bank details
    SELECT SINGLE * FROM lfbk WHERE lifnr = iv_lifnr.
  ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.

ZCL_MM_VENDOR_EVAL.source:
CLASS zcl_mm_vendor_eval DEFINITION PUBLIC FINAL CREATE PUBLIC.
  PUBLIC SECTION.
    TYPES: BEGIN OF ty_vendor_score,
             lifnr TYPE lifnr,
             score TYPE i,
             grade TYPE c LENGTH 1,
           END OF ty_vendor_score.
    METHODS evaluate_vendor
      IMPORTING iv_lifnr TYPE lifnr
      RETURNING VALUE(rs_score) TYPE ty_vendor_score.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_mm_vendor_eval IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD evaluate_vendor.
    DATA: lt_po_hist TYPE TABLE OF ekko.
    SELECT * FROM ekko INTO TABLE lt_po_hist WHERE lifnr = iv_lifnr.
    " Legacy table approach
    DATA: lt_vendor_data TYPE lfa1 OCCURS 10.
    CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_VENDOR_GETDETAIL'
      EXPORTING vendorno = iv_lifnr
      TABLES   return   = lt_return.
    rs_score-lifnr = iv_lifnr.
    rs_score-score = lines( lt_po_hist ).
  ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.

ZCL_SD_ORDER_PROC.source:
CLASS zcl_sd_order_proc DEFINITION PUBLIC FINAL CREATE PUBLIC.
  PUBLIC SECTION.
    METHODS create_order
      IMPORTING is_header TYPE zsd_order_header
                it_items TYPE zsd_order_items_t
      RETURNING VALUE(rv_vbeln) TYPE vbeln.
    METHODS update_order
      IMPORTING iv_vbeln TYPE vbeln
                it_changes TYPE zsd_changes_t.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_sd_order_proc IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD create_order.
    " Direct customer master access
    DATA: ls_customer TYPE kna1.
    SELECT SINGLE * FROM kna1 INTO ls_customer WHERE kunnr = is_header-kunnr.
    DATA: ls_knvv TYPE knvv.
    SELECT SINGLE * FROM knvv INTO ls_knvv WHERE kunnr = is_header-kunnr.
    " BDC for order creation
    CALL TRANSACTION 'VA01' USING lt_bdcdata MODE 'N'.
    rv_vbeln = '0000000001'.
  ENDMETHOD.
  METHOD update_order.
    CALL TRANSACTION 'VA02' USING lt_bdcdata MODE 'N'.
  ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.

ZCL_SD_OUTPUT_MGR.source:
CLASS zcl_sd_output_mgr DEFINITION PUBLIC FINAL CREATE PUBLIC.
  PUBLIC SECTION.
    METHODS send_output
      IMPORTING iv_vbeln TYPE vbeln
                iv_kschl TYPE kschl.
    METHODS get_output_status
      IMPORTING iv_vbeln TYPE vbeln
      RETURNING VALUE(rt_status) TYPE zsd_output_status_t.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_sd_output_mgr IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD send_output.
    DATA: ls_nast TYPE nast.
    SELECT SINGLE * FROM nast INTO ls_nast
      WHERE objky = iv_vbeln AND kschl = iv_kschl.
    " Get processing routine from TNAPR
    DATA: ls_tnapr TYPE tnapr.
    SELECT SINGLE * FROM tnapr INTO ls_tnapr WHERE kschl = iv_kschl.
  ENDMETHOD.
  METHOD get_output_status.
    SELECT * FROM nast INTO TABLE rt_status
      WHERE objky = iv_vbeln.
  ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.

ZCL_SD_DELIVERY.source:
CLASS zcl_sd_delivery DEFINITION PUBLIC FINAL CREATE PUBLIC.
  PUBLIC SECTION.
    METHODS create_delivery
      IMPORTING iv_vbeln TYPE vbeln
      RETURNING VALUE(rv_vbeln_vl) TYPE vbeln_vl.
    METHODS check_warehouse
      IMPORTING iv_lgnum TYPE lgnum
                iv_matnr TYPE matnr.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_sd_delivery IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD create_delivery.
    " Use BAPI for delivery
    CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_OUTB_DELIVERY_CREATE_SLS'
      EXPORTING ship_point = 'SP01'.
    rv_vbeln_vl = '0080000001'.
  ENDMETHOD.
  METHOD check_warehouse.
    " Classic WM stock check
    DATA: lt_stock TYPE TABLE OF lagp.
    SELECT * FROM lagp INTO TABLE lt_stock
      WHERE lgnum = iv_lgnum AND matnr = iv_matnr.
    DATA: lt_quants TYPE TABLE OF lqua.
    SELECT * FROM lqua INTO TABLE lt_quants
      WHERE lgnum = iv_lgnum AND matnr = iv_matnr.
  ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.

ZREP_FI_MONTHLY.source:
REPORT zrep_fi_monthly.

TABLES: bkpf, bseg, bsis, kna1.

DATA: lt_items TYPE bseg OCCURS 100,
      lt_gl_items TYPE TABLE OF bsis.

SELECT-OPTIONS: s_bukrs FOR bkpf-bukrs,
                 s_gjahr FOR bkpf-gjahr.

START-OF-SELECTION.
  SELECT * FROM bseg INTO TABLE lt_items
    WHERE bukrs IN s_bukrs AND gjahr IN s_gjahr.
  SELECT * FROM bsis INTO TABLE lt_gl_items
    WHERE bukrs IN s_bukrs AND gjahr IN s_gjahr.

  " Cost element lookup
  DATA: lt_cska TYPE TABLE OF cska.
  SELECT * FROM cska INTO TABLE lt_cska.

  WRITE: / 'Monthly Financial Report'.
  WRITE: / 'Items:', lines( lt_items ).
  WRITE: / 'GL Items:', lines( lt_gl_items ).

ZCL_WM_STOCK_CHECK.source:
CLASS zcl_wm_stock_check DEFINITION PUBLIC FINAL CREATE PUBLIC.
  PUBLIC SECTION.
    METHODS check_stock
      IMPORTING iv_lgnum TYPE lgnum
                iv_matnr TYPE matnr
      RETURNING VALUE(rv_qty) TYPE menge_d.
ENDCLASS.

CLASS zcl_wm_stock_check IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD check_stock.
    DATA: lt_lagp TYPE TABLE OF lagp,
          lt_lqua TYPE TABLE OF lqua,
          lt_ltap TYPE TABLE OF ltap.
    SELECT * FROM lagp INTO TABLE lt_lagp
      WHERE lgnum = iv_lgnum AND matnr = iv_matnr.
    SELECT * FROM lqua INTO TABLE lt_lqua
      WHERE lgnum = iv_lgnum AND matnr = iv_matnr.
    SELECT * FROM ltap INTO TABLE lt_ltap
      WHERE lgnum = iv_lgnum.
    " Create transfer order
    CALL FUNCTION 'L_TO_CREATE_MOVE_SU'
      EXPORTING lgnum = iv_lgnum.
    rv_qty = lines( lt_lqua ).
  ENDMETHOD.
ENDCLASS.

ZRP_SD_BACKLOG.source:
REPORT zrp_sd_backlog.

TABLES: vbak, vbap, kna1.

DATA: lt_orders TYPE TABLE OF vbak,
      lt_items TYPE TABLE OF vbap,
      lv_matnr TYPE c LENGTH 18.

SELECT-OPTIONS: s_vkorg FOR vbak-vkorg.

START-OF-SELECTION.
  SELECT * FROM vbak INTO TABLE lt_orders
    WHERE vkorg IN s_vkorg.
  " Customer name lookup
  DATA: ls_kna1 TYPE kna1.
  SELECT SINGLE * FROM kna1 INTO ls_kna1 WHERE kunnr = lt_orders[ 1 ]-kunnr.
  WRITE: / 'Sales Backlog Report'.
  WRITE: / 'Orders:', lines( lt_orders ).
